title: GitLab security advisory (AV25-689)
description: On October 22, 2025, GitLab published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: GitLab Community Edition (CE)  versions prior to 18.5.1, 18.4.3 and 18.3.5
GitLab Enterprise Edition (EE)  versions prior to 18.5.1, 18.4.3 and 18.3.5
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
